name: Tank Blasters
description:
A game made during the #kenneyjam

Defend the city... With a nasty problem... What is this you ask? Well, you just have to play to see. 

Web build can be found here: https://sciencej.itch.io/tank-blaster-web.

The current prototype version does not include sounds and much more is planned including an end to the game. At the moment, tanks will just keep spawning.

If you liked this, please follow the game and consider leaving a donation.

Much thanks to Kenney.nl for the art assets.

Liked it? Leave a comment :)
